meta-llama/Meta-Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct-Tu.content: You are a participant in a cognitive task. You will be shown a sequence of letters, one at a time. For example, given the sequence q, v, m, z, v, the answers should be:
q and none are different.
v and none are different.
m and none are different.
z and q are different.
v and v are identical.

m and none are different.
q and q are identical.
z and m are different.

q and none are different. (There was no letter 3 steps ago.)
